page.title: 09BRANDON GRANGE FARM,COVENTRY
page.content: {BRANDON GRANGE FARM}-520 acres between Brandon and Bretford on N.side R.Avon Mixed farm-280acres cereal,40 potatoes 40 rape,160 grass.6 year rotation-2 years each crop.Dairy herd of 192 friesians, one Hereford bull.All calves sold for fattening.Cows calve from 3 to 14 yrs give about 5800 litres of milk per year. Milking parlour for 14cows.It takes 3hr starting 5.30a.m.&4.30p.m.New storage tank cost Â£12000.Cows inside Oct/Apr fed silage,hay,barley,turnips.Big problems with daily cleaning out of cows in winter,disposing of manure and out-flow from silage. {* * * * * * * * * * * * * The farm has been owned by the same family for 75 years.They employ 6 workers.They love farm life and animals.The worst times are when animals die or are sold.
